issue.title: [C++] Add a facility helper for SIMD runtime dispatch.
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-9717](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9717). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
During the discussion of <https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/7940>, It will has SIMD runtime path for different functions, it could be nice to have a SIMD dispatch facility helper instead handling it in each function.

 

The implementation should be performance friendly, resolver only need run one time.
